content: * *This article has multiple issues.** Please help **improve it** or discuss these issues on the **talk page**. *(Learn how and when to remove these messages)*This article **is an orphan, as no other articles link to it**. Please introduce links to this page from related articles. *(December 2025)*This article **relies largely or entirely on a single source**. Relevant discussion may be found on the talk page. Please help improve this article by introducing citations to additional sources. *Find sources:* "List of cancer treatment centres in Singapore" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(October 2016)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* [Cancer](/wiki/Cancer) treatment centres in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) are generally located in both public and private hospitals. These units and medical centres specialise in the treatment of cancer ([oncology](/wiki/Oncology)). - [Raffles Hospital](/wiki/Raffles_Hospital) - [Parkway East Hospital](/wiki/Parkway_East_Hospital) - Parkway Cancer Centre - [Gleneagles Hospital](/wiki/Gleneagles_Hospital) - Parkway Cancer Centre - [Tan Tock Seng Hospital](/wiki/Tan_Tock_Seng_Hospital) - [Singapore General Hospital](/wiki/Singapore_General_Hospital) - [KK Women's and Children's Hospital](/wiki/KK_Women%27s_and_Children%27s_Hospital) - [Mount Elizabeth Hospital](/wiki/Mount_Elizabeth_Hospital) - Parkway Cancer Centre - [National Cancer Centre](/wiki/National_Cancer_Centre_Singapore) - [National University Hospital](/wiki/National_University_Hospital) - [Changi General Hospital](/wiki/Changi_General_Hospital)
title: List of cancer treatment centres in Singapore
